snippet.title: The New Aphelion Looked Incredible… Until We Tested It
snippet.description:
Raiders! Patch 1.3 brings major balance changes and the new Aphelion legendary weapon. In this video, we break down how to get the blueprint, crafting requirements, full weapon stats, and real gameplay performance in both PvE and PvP. We compare the Aphelion to the Jupiter, test its armor penetration, accuracy, recoil, and damage, and dive into the biggest nerfs and system updates in Patch 1.3.

0:00 Intro
0:47 Aphelion Crafting & Stats 
2:55 Aphelion Combat
6:14 1.3 Patch Changes
